casebody.data:
HARRIS, et al.
v.
MATTHEWS, et al. No. 479PA05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2006. Joshua B. Durham, Charlotte, for Matthews. Lisa Godfrey, Charlotte, for Harris et al. Kenneth R. Raynor, Charlotte, for Sharla Byrd. *579David W. Gilpin, Charlotte, for Aaron Moore. Shirley Fulton, for St. Luke Baptist Church.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of September 2006 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Harris, et al.) shall have up to and including the 26th day of October 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of September 2006."
